TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed TypedDataSetGenerator/GenerateOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: Provides the with information for creating typed datasets that support LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.

span.span: Provides the with information for creating typed datasets that support LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il enumerazione fornisce il con le informazioni sul tipo di dataset tipizzato da creare quando il `TypedDataSetGenerator.Generate` metodo viene chiamato.The enumeration provides the with information about the type of typed dataset to create when the `TypedDataSetGenerator.Generate` method is called. Il enumerazione consente di implementare nuove funzionalità nei dataset tipizzati senza dover creare overload aggiuntivi per il `TypedDataSetGenerator.Generate` metodo.The enumeration enables you to implement new features in typed datasets without needing to create additional overloads to the `TypedDataSetGenerator.Generate` method. > [!NOTE] > LINQ to DataSet e l'aggiornamento gerarchico sono funzionalità che sono stati aggiunti in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].LINQ to DataSet and hierarchical update are features that were added in [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)]. > > Vedere anche [Panoramica di aggiornamento gerarchico](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).Also see [Hierarchical Update Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c4f8e8b9-e4a5-4a02-8462-d03d1e8222d6).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator/GenerateOption HierarchicalUpdate = int32(1)

summary.span: Generates typed datasets that have a TableAdapterManager and associated methods for enabling hierarchical update.

span.span: Generates typed datasets that have a TableAdapterManager and associated methods for enabling hierarchical update.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator/GenerateOption LinqOverTypedDatasets = int32(2)

summary.span: Generates typed datasets that have data tables that inherit from in order to enable the ability to perform LINQ queries on data tables.

span.span: Generates typed datasets that have data tables that inherit from in order to enable the ability to perform LINQ queries on data tables.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.TypedDataSetGenerator/GenerateOption None = int32(0)

summary.span: Generates typed datasets that are compatible with typed datasets generated in versions of Visual Studio earlier than [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].

span.span: Generates typed datasets that are compatible with typed datasets generated in versions of Visual Studio earlier than [!INCLUDE[vs_orcas_long](~/includes/vs-orcas-long-md.md)].
